cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Changing the local S address to an invalid IP (10.0.0.1) prevents the CU from properly binding to the local interface for F1-Southbound connections.

du.explanation_en: Shifting the PRACH message 1 frequency start point causes frequency domain misalignment, resulting in UEs failing to transmit PRACH preambles correctly.
